targets.query: SELECT count(*)  FROM (SELECT  count("count") FROM "spring_integration_send" GROUP BY "stream_name") WHERE time > now() - 1m
select distinct("stream_name") as "streams" from (select  * from "spring_integration_send" WHERE time > now() - 60s)
SELECT distinct("application_name")  as "apps" FROM (SELECT * FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE  ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ )  group by application_name)

panels.description: Channel Errors across all Streams and Apps

targets.query: SELECT "count"  / 60 FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream$/ AND "application_name" =~ /^$application$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "name" = 'errorChannel') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "stream_name", "application_name", "result"

panels.title: Channel Errors

panels.description: Number of running Applications for selected streams

targets.query: SELECT count(distinct(application_name)) FROM (SELECT * FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE  ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ )  group by application_name)

panels.title: # Apps per Stream

targets.query: SELECT count("count")  / 60 FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "application_name" =~ /^$application$/ AND "result" = 'success' AND ( "name" = 'output' OR "name" = 'input')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application_name", "result", "application_name", "name"

SELECT "count"  / 60 FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "name" = 'errorChannel') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "stream_name", "application_name", "result"

SELECT "count"  / 60 FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "result" = 'success' AND ( "name" = 'output' OR "name" = 'input')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application_name", "name"

SELECT "mean" FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "result" = 'success' AND ( "name" = 'output' OR "name" = 'input')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "stream_name", "application_name",  "name"

SELECT "count"  / 60 FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "name" = 'errorChannel') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "stream_name", "application_name", "result"

list.definition: select distinct("stream_name") from (select  * from "spring_integration_send" WHERE time > now() - 60s)
list.label: Stream
list.name: stream_name
list.query: select distinct("stream_name") from (select  * from "spring_integration_send" WHERE time > now() - 60s)

list.definition: show tag values with key="application_name" WHERE stream_name='$stream_name'
list.label: application
list.name: application_name
list.query: show tag values with key="application_name" WHERE stream_name='$stream_name'
list.tagValuesQuery: show tag values with key="application_name" WHERE stream='$stream' AND stream_type = '$tag'

list.label: ApplicationId
list.name: application_id
list.query: show tag values from "spring_integration_send" with key = "application_guid" WHERE stream_name = '$stream'
list.tagValuesQuery: show tag values with key = "application_guid" WHERE stream_name = '$stream' and application_name = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: show tag values with key="application_name" WHERE stream_name='$stream'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "spring_integration_send" WITH KEY = "application_name"
list.name: streamCount
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "spring_integration_send" WITH KEY = "application_name"
